name: Kill Our Demons
description:
Escape your reality and bear arms to take on the most dangerous enemies of all: your mental demons. Battle it out, rise up and build your arsenal of tools and equipment. 
Kill Our Demons is a top-down, over the shoulder, experience based in Mestate City. A city full of darkness and demonic sightings. Don’t forget there’s a strange man in the park too. 

Background Information:
This game was developed in 13 weeks, the alpha version was designed to be utilised as part of a User Study intended for my Master’s Dissertation at Swansea University. This is my first official game release, and has been a pleasure to develop, collaborate with university tutors and stakeholders and overall an enjoyable experience. 
No crunch took place.
